title: As a DTC Admin, I want to be able to sort columns on the Drug Test Consent
custom_steps:

* Double clicking on columns headers will sort the table by that column
* Clicking first will sort it ascending clicking again will sort it descending

title: As a Partner League President, I want to view the History of all Four Leagues
custom_steps:
Context: The four Partner Leagues came together and agreed that they would like the access the â€œHistoryâ€� tab for all leagues - instead of being limited to their own.

AC:

* On the History page, add new tabs for each league:
** American
** Atlantic
** Frontier
** Pioneer
* Open the History page to display the history of all four leagues for each league
** League Presidents Only
* The page should default to the tab of whichever league is signed into the portal

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Add a New "Investigation List" Roster Status upon Accepting Terms
custom_steps:
AC:

* For First Year International players that have a submitted contract, but without a completed investigation:
** When BOC goes Accept Terms, there will be a new secondary option called â€œAccept & Place on Investigation Listâ€� upon selecting the Accept Terms carrot (See attached)
** When selected, the player will fall under the new Roster Status called â€œInvestigation Listâ€�
*** They should not count against the 35 man roster limit
*** This will not be a new Transaction, only a new roster status
*** This will be the status instead of â€œPending Activeâ€�

title: As a Partner League Admin, Add a Rule Check so Players are Not Removed from a Roster with a Pending Tx
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a player is removed from a roster on the Partner League Portal
* The system will run a check to see if that player is involved in a pending transaction (trade, mlb request, etc)
* If the system finds that the player has a pending transaction in place, the removal will not occur and an error message will appear:
** Title: Error
** Text: Player involved in pending transaction.
** Buttons: Close

title: As an EMR Admin, I want to be Notified about Reversal Txs on EBIS
custom_steps:
AC:

* Create a new EBIS user group: EBIS-EMR-REVERSAL-NOTIFS
** This would be a permission that can be assigned to any individual account
* Add this group to the Receiving Group for any Transaction Reversal
** This new group should receive notifications of transaction reversals in their EBIS Clipboard

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Receive Slack Notifications upon Submission to BOC
custom_steps:
AC:

* Upon Clubs submitting a Major League Transaction to BOC, a notification will go to the BOC-Only Slack channel: Major-Transaction-Review
** i.e. For all relevant Major League Transactions that BOC must approve/reject that we currently have notifications for
* Notification Details:
** Channels:
*** This should be a Slack notification 
**** This would show up in the Major-Transactions-Submissions Slack channel
** Messages:
*** Slack Message: Player Name - Date - ORG - Transaction has been Submitted to BOC
** High Level Bucket: 
*** Major League Transactions
** This will not be a High Priority notification
** The notification should link to the relevant transaction for BOC approval

title: As a Club Admin, I want to get a Notification to Fill in a Transferred Player's SSN
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a player is transferred to a domestic roster, the system should run a check to see if their Social Security Number has been filled in.
* If EBIS recognizes that there is no entered SSN on the playerâ€™s profile, the system will generate a notification 30 days after the player has been transferred to the domestic roster (30 days after the transaction has been Approved by BOC).
** A subsequent notification will be generated every 15 days until the field is filled in
* Notification Details:
** Channels:
*** This should be both a Slack notification and an EBIS Clipboard notification
**** This would show up in the relevant clubâ€™s MN Transactions Slack channel
** Messages:
*** EBIS Clipboard Description: No SSN entered for Transferred Player
*** Slack Message: Player Name - ORG - No SSN entered for Transferred Player
** High Level Bucket: 
*** Minor League Transactions
** EBIS Recipients: 
*** Minor Contracts Club Admin/Viewers
** This will not initially be a High Priority notification
** The notification should link to the relevant playerâ€™s profile for the SSN for be filled in

title: As a MNC Admin, I want 0.000 MLS players on subsequent MJCs to recieve a higher minimum salary when optioned or outrighted
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player with 0.000 MLS is optioned or outrighted while on a subsequent MJC (not their first career MJC), EBIS will use the â€œMinimum Minor League Salary LRDâ€� amount
* If the player has a P2 that is greater than the â€œMinimum Minor League Salary LRDâ€� amount, EBIS will use the P2 instead

title: Update the International Signing Period so that it consistently uses the same year as the period
custom_steps:
Currently, the system dates for the intl signing period are offset from the year of the actual signing period (see the attached screenshot).  We need to update these to make them the same year as the actual signing period / calendar year.

This will require ensuring that loading old data still loads the right period's information.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to be able to Create a New Employee Permission Request
custom_steps:
Context: BOC wants to be able to Submit Permission Requests in the same way that Club Users can

AC:

* After navigating to the Permission Requests tab on the Employees, there will be a â€œCreate New Requestâ€� button at the bottom of the screen
* Selecting this button will bring up the Request transaction screen with the following sections. See attached:
** Details
** Proposed Permission Period
** Comments
** Employee Permission Process Information
*** This section will include the attachments linked below
**** Tampering Policy
**** Interview Process for Baseball Positions
** Note: There will be no Inquiring Club Details section
* There will be three actions buttons at the bottom of the transaction screen:
** Submit
*** Selecting to Submit should set the Current Status to Pending (in green text)
** Save
** Cancel

title: Convert the Major Contract Award Bonus Packages widget to react
Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)
